title: Sapphire eSports recruitment - Coach
body:
Sapphire eSports is seeking a new coach to help develop and push their competitive team to the next level. We are currently recruiting a new coach that is wishing to develop analytical skills and learn along the way. You will work alongside experienced members to help develop your understanding of the game at a macro and micro level.

Requirements
- Able to attend several sets of scrims per week.
- Open minded and willing to learn
- A passion for numbers and looking at LoL beyond it's playing value
- Leadership skills
- Time management 
- Organised
- Passion for esports 
- Thorough understanding of League of Legends on a macro and micro level 

No experience is required, but definitely helps.

If you are interested in the role, please contact "Baby Glacial" in game to set up a trial/meeting.
